reviewText: 1995, two VHS tapes by Ignatius Press, each with four half-hour programs.  The narrator, Father Groeschel, is a psychologist as well as a member of the Franciscan Friars of Renewal, a fairly new order.  Discussion of the difference between natural virtues shared by all people and supernatural virtues. He explains how faith, hope, and charity are misunderstood by secular culture.
